clues.text: Jimi Hendrix electrified fans with "All Along The Watchtower", written by this folksy guy

Flemish painter responsible for "The Judgment of Paris"

Self-examination; literally, "a looking into oneself"

The Louisiana Purchase, made during his term, doubled the size of the U.S.

After leaving office in 1837, he retired to the Hermitage, his Tennessee plantation

rounds.text: Its name is from the Portuguese for "goblin", referring to the facelike appearance of its 3 depressions
